```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE} 
#Cargamos librerias
library(lubridate)
library(car)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(rmarkdown)
library(mosaicData)
library(stringr)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(ggthemes)
library(pander)
library(xtable)
library(reshape2)
library(scales)
library(tibble)
library(abind)

library(knitr)

```

```{r CargadeDatos echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Llamamos a todos los archivos que vamos a utilizar.
DistilationMatGlyco<-c("/home/user/Desktop/Pasantia/Golgi/BoC Distilation/Distilation-Mat Glyco/ResultsIntrTransp3-1.csv","/home/user/Desktop/Pasantia/Golgi/BoC Distilation/Distilation-Mat Glyco/ResultsIntrTransp3-2.csv","/home/user/Desktop/Pasantia/Golgi/BoC Distilation/Distilation-Mat Glyco/ResultsIntrTransp3-3.csv")
DistMatGlycoData<-data.frame(matrix(nrow=150,ncol=300))
#Este loop une todos los data frame que tengas en uno solo.
 for (i in 1:length(DistilationMatGlyco)){
   if(i!=1){ 
   SubjectDataM<-read.csv(DistilationMatGlyco[i],header=TRUE,sep=",")
   DistMatGlycoData<-bind_cols(DistMatGlycoData,SubjectDataM,.name_repair = "minimal")#El minimal indica que no haya reparacion de nombres
   
   
   }
   else if (i==1){DistMatGlycoData<-(SubjectDataM<-read.csv(DistilationMatGlyco[i],header=TRUE,sep=","))
   
   }}
#Definimos los nombres para que todos unicos.
nombres<-names(DistMatGlycoData)
nombresunicos<-make.unique(nombres,sep = "")
colnames(DistMatGlycoData)<-nombresunicos
#Ahora los reestablecemos como los nombres del data frame
#Vamos a cortar los datos hasta los 30k ticks para ver algo mejor la parte importante del transporte y normalizarlos
DistMatGlycoData<-(DistMatGlycoData/8033)

```


```{r echo=FALSE,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Promedio de cada una de las Cisternas del Golgi para el cargo especifico
PostGolgi<-rowMeans(DistMatGlycoData[,c("memS","memS1","memS2")])
C1<-rowMeans(DistMatGlycoData[,c("memSRabA","memSRabA1","memSRabA2")])
C2<-rowMeans(DistMatGlycoData[,c("memSRabB","memSRabB1","memSRabB2")])
C3<-rowMeans(DistMatGlycoData[,c("memSRabC","memSRabC1","memSRabC2")])
C4<-rowMeans(DistMatGlycoData[,c("memSRabD","memSRabD1","memSRabD2")])
C5<-rowMeans(DistMatGlycoData[,c("memSRabE","memSRabE1","memSRabE2")])
dataframepromM0.1CmemS<-data_frame(C1,C2,C3,C4,C5,PostGolgi)
n<-length(dataframepromM0.1CmemS$C1)*100
ticks<-seq(100,n,by=100)
dataframepromM0.1CmemS$ticks<-ticks
dmemS<-melt(dataframepromM0.1CmemS,id.vars="ticks")
memSGraf<-ggplot(dmemS,aes(x=ticks,y=value,color=variable))+geom_point(size=45)+geom_line(size=20)+labs(x="",y="")+scale_color_manual(values = c("C1" = "blue", "C2" = "skyblue2","C3"="green4","C4"="red","C5"="yellow","PostGolgi"="grey1"))+theme_classic()+ theme(legend.position="none",legend.title=element_blank(),axis.text = element_blank(),plot.title = element_blank(),axis.title = element_blank(),legend.text = element_blank(),axis.line = element_line(size=12),axis.ticks = element_line(colour = "black", size = 10))+theme( axis.ticks.length=unit(2, "cm"),axis.ticks.margin=unit(0.5,"cm"))+ylim(0, 1.2)+scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(0,15000,30000))
memSGraf
ggsave("memSDistilationGlyco.png",plot = memSGraf , width = 35, height = 30, dpi = 200, units = "in", device='png')
```
